title: Basketball
description: This week we have a really special episode. Not only do we head down to the warehouse for a 'friendly' basketball game and meet Daryl, but this is the episode of The Office Jenna and Angela became real life BFF's! Then the ladies talk about real life injuries and Kevin (Brian Baumgartner) sinking all those baskets. Finally, Jenna reveals the story behind why Pam and Roy have been engaged for so long. Please don't throw garbage at this episode.
author: rss@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Jenna Fischer and Angela Kinsey)
